form.label: API Big Stats Dashboard - Structured
form.description: Top level API stats related to requests, result codes and client info.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ |spath output=name path="message.app_name" | table name | dedup name | sort name
index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ | spath output=ipaddr path="message.ip_addr" | table ipaddr | dedup ipaddr | sort ipaddr

h1.b: API End-Point Requests vs. Total HTTP Requests

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | stats count
index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.path!="/health*" | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokEpCount$, Total2=$tokTcCount$ | eval percent= round((Total1/Total2)*100,1) | table percent

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | timechart count
index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ message.path!="/health*" | timechart count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") AND "message.path" = "/$apiVersionsPattern$/fhir/*" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") AND "message.path" = "/$apiVersionsPattern$/accounts/*" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") AND "message.path" = "/$apiVersionsPattern$/o/*" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") AND "message.path" = "*/admin/*" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") AND ("message.path" != "/$apiVersionsPattern$/fhir/*" AND "message.path" != "/$apiVersionsPattern$/accounts/*" AND "message.path" != "/$apiVersionsPattern$/o/*" AND "message.path" != "*/admin/*") | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokEpCount$

h1.b: API Result Codes Over Time Range

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ message.path!="/health*" | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=code path="message.response_code" | table code | stats count by code

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ message.path!="/health*" | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=code path="message.response_code" | table code | stats count by code

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ message.path!="/health*" | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND (message.response_code > 399) AND (message.response_code < 600) AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=code path="message.response_code" | table code | stats count by code

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ message.path!="/health*" | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND (message.response_code > 399) AND (message.response_code < 600) AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=code path="message.response_code" | table code | stats count by code

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ message.path!="/health*" | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=html_code2 path="message.response_code" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | spath output=start_time path="message.start_time" | spath output=end_time path="message.end_time" | eval elapsed_time=start_time-end_time | table html_code2 call_path elapsed_time | stats count by call_path | sort - count

h1.b: End Point Response Timings (RT_fastest, RT_mean, RT_p95, RT_p99, and RT_slowest time in seconds)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=html_code2 path="message.response_code" | where html_code2="200" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v[12]/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit/.*" | spath output=start_time path="message.start_time" | spath output=end_time path="message.end_time" | eval Response_Time=round((end_time-start_time)*1000,2) | stats min(Response_Time) as RT_fastest avg(Response_Time) as RT_mean p95(Response_Time) as RT_p95 p99(Response_Time) as RT_p99 max(Response_Time) as RT_slowest by message.path | eval RT_mean=round(RT_mean, 2)

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ message.path!="/health*" | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | rex call_path_base=message.path "(?/v[12]/fhir/[Patient|Coverage|ExplanationOfBenefit]/.*)" | spath output=html_code2 path="message.response_code" | where html_code2="200" | spath output=start_time path="message.start_time" | spath output=end_time path="message.end_time" | eval Response_Time=end_time-start_time | stats min(Response_Time) as RT_fastest avg(Response_Time) as RT_mean p95(Response_Time) as RT_p95 p99(Response_Time) as RT_p99 max(Response_Time) as RT_slowest by message.path | sort - RT_mean | head 10

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=client_id path="message.app_id" | where client_id != "" | stats distinct_count(client_id) as cid_total

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=client_id path="message.app_id" | spath output=name path="message.app_name" | spath output=user path="message.dev_name" | where client_id != "" | stats count by client_id, name, user | sort - count

panel.title: Requests by IP for API Requests Only

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=client_id path="message.app_id" | spath output=name path="message.app_name" | spath output=user path="message.dev_name" | spath output=source_ip path="message.ip_addr" | where client_id != "" | stats count by source_ip,client_id,name,user | sort - count | iplocation source_ip | table source_ip,client_id,name,user,City Region Country,count

panel.title: GeoStats MAP for API Requests Only

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=source_ip path="message.ip_addr"| stats count by source_ip | sort - count | iplocation source_ip | geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon count

panel.title: Requests by IP for ALL Requests

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" | spath output=client_id path="message.app_id" | spath output=name path="message.app_name" | spath output=user path="message.dev_name" | spath output=source_ip path="message.ip_addr" | stats count by source_ip,client_id,name,user | sort - count | iplocation source_ip | table source_ip,client_id,name,user,City Region Country,count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" | spath output=source_ip path="message.ip_addr"| stats count by source_ip | sort - count | iplocation source_ip | geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon count

h1.b: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /$apiVersionsLabel$/connect/userinfo end point. Including those blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/connect/userinfo" | search message.response_code=403 | table time message.path message.app_name message.user message.response_code | stats count by message.app_name

panel.title: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /$apiVersionsLabel$/connect/userinfo end point. Including those blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/connect/userinfo" | search message.response_code=403 | stats count by message.app_name

h1.b: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /$apiVersionsLabel$/fhir/Patient/ end point. Including those blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/fhir/patient*" | search message.response_code=403 | table time message.path message.app_name message.user message.response_code | stats count by message.app_name

panel.title: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /$apiVersionsLabel$/fhir/Patient/ end point. Including those blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/fhir/patient*" | search message.response_code=403 | stats count by message.app_name

h1.b: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /$apiVersionsLabel$/fhir/Coverage/ end point. THESE SHOULD NOT BE blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/fhir/coverage*" | search message.response_code=403 | table time message.path message.app_name message.user message.response_code | stats count by message.app_name

panel.title: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /$apiVersionsLabel$/fhir/Coverage/ end point. THESE SHOULD NOT BE blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/fhir/coverage*" | search message.response_code=403 | stats count by message.app_name

h1.b: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /$apiVersionsLabel$/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit/ end point. THESE SHOULD NOT BE blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/fhir/explanationofbenefit*" | search message.response_code=403 | table time message.path message.app_name message.user message.response_code | stats count by message.app_name

panel.title: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /$apiVersionsLabel$/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit/ end point. THESE SHOULD NOT BE blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ $appNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/$apiVersionsPattern$/fhir/explanationofbenefit*" | search message.response_code=403 | stats count by message.app_name
